content: As we've mentioned in previous earnings calls, our revenue growth is decelerating because, one, our business is roughly 40% transactional and has a correlation to the health of the formations macro, which has been declining; and two, we're experiencing consecutive years of a reduced formations macro, which negatively impacts compliance subscriptions revenue that's attached at the time of formation.
